mapper.insert: insert into NOTICE (BOARDNO, BOARDINFONO, TITLE, USERNAME, DEPTNAME, RANKNAME, "SECURITY", IMPORTANT, "STATE", "TYPE", REGISTDATE, HIT, ATTACHYN, RESERVATIONYN, MODIFYDATE, USERID, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, USERNO, FILENO, NOTICEYN, ACTIVEYN, TAG, CONTENTMODE, ENTRYDATE, ENTRYDEPT, FIXVIEW, NOTICESTARTDATE, NOTICEENDDATE, NOTICERESERVEYN, LOGINYN) values (#{boardno}, #{boardinfono}, #{title}, #{username}, #{deptname}, #{rankname}, #{security}, #{important}, #{state}, #{type}, #{registdate}, #{hit}, #{attachyn}, #{reservationyn}, #{modifydate}, #{userid}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{userno}, #{fileno}, #{noticeyn}, #{activeyn}, #{tag}, #{contentmode}, #{entrydate}, #{entrydept}, #{fixview}, #{noticestartdate}, #{noticeenddate}, #{noticereserveyn}, #{loginyn})

mapper.update: update NOTICE set TITLE = #{title}, USERNAME = #{username}, DEPTNAME = #{deptname}, RANKNAME = #{rankname}, "SECURITY" = #{security}, IMPORTANT = #{important}, "STATE" = #{state}, "TYPE" = #{type}, REGISTDATE = #{registdate}, HIT = #{hit}, ATTACHYN = #{attachyn}, RESERVATIONYN = #{reservationyn}, MODIFYDATE = #{modifydate}, USERID = #{userid}, STARTDATE = #{startdate}, ENDDATE = #{enddate}, USERNO = #{userno}, FILENO = #{fileno}, NOTICEYN = #{noticeyn}, ACTIVEYN = #{activeyn}, TAG = #{tag}, CONTENTMODE = #{contentmode}, ENTRYDATE = #{entrydate}, ENTRYDEPT = #{entrydept}, FIXVIEW = #{fixview}, NOTICESTARTDATE = #{noticestartdate}, NOTICEENDDATE = #{noticeenddate}, NOTICERESERVEYN = #{noticereserveyn}, LOGINYN = #{loginyn} where BOARDNO = #{boardno} and BOARDINFONO = #{boardinfono}

update NOTICE
TITLE = #{title},
USERNAME = #{username},
DEPTNAME = #{deptname},
